name: Solitaire – Classic Card Game.
description:
Your favourite classic solitaire game is now available on your mobile, so you can enjoy it anytime, anywhere!

Solitaire – A Classic Card Game, is here to draw you in and give you the ultimate Klondike experience! Also known as Patience, solitaire is among the most popular card games in the world, and for good reason! This classic solitaire card game by Tripledot Studios is the ideal app for the best casual gaming experience and more importantly – this online strategy game helps TRAIN YOUR BRAIN and KEEP YOUR MIND SHARP!

Enjoy endless hours of fun with these unique features:
• Play your favourite classic solitaire with 1 card draw
• Challenge yourself and play classic Patience featuring 3 card draw!
• Place your wager and become the solitaire champion with our Vegas Scoring
• Add up your Klondike wins with the Vegas Cumulative mode
• UNLIMITED free solitaire hints and undo options
• Amazing daily challenges
• Track your patience gameplay statistics: Personal records, challenges solved, crowns and trophy status
• Customize your table & solitaire cards design

Play Classic Solitaire for FREE now on iOS!
